## 1

```{r}
mean_test <- function(x, ...) {
  if(is.numeric(x) | any(is.na(x)) == FALSE) {
    z <- na.omit(x)
    sum(z)/length(z)
    }
  if(is.numeric(x) | any(is.na(x)) == TRUE) {
    warning(sum(is.na(x)), " cases of missing data were removed")
    z <- na.omit(x)
    sum(z)/length(z)
  }  
    else {
        return()
    }
}
```

## 2

```{r}
test <- c(1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 3, 4, 6, NA, NA, NA)
mean_test(test)
mean(test, na.rm = TRUE)
```
